title: Simulating the outcome of binary neutron star merger in common envelope jets supernovae
comment: 模拟了在一个红超巨星(RSG)内双中子星并合的演化产物.

title: A theoretical model of an off-axis GRB jet
comment: 偏轴高帽喷流产生的余辉的演化及其与周围介质的相互作用的模型

title: A VLA Survey of Late-time Radio Emission from Superluminous Supernovae and the Host Galaxies
comment: 在3GHz上对23个SLSN以及宿主星系做了射电搜寻, 结果只在一个SLSN和5个宿主星系中探测到了射电辐射

title: Chromatic periodic activity down to 120 megahertz in a fast radio burst
comment: 在高频段和低频段上对周期FRB20180916B做了观测,发现其低频段(120MHz)的相对高频段具色差的活动性.
